name: LeaderboardDialog
shortDescription: Score display dialog with submit-to-leaderboard, retry, and main menu buttons.
description: Display the score and let players choose what to do next:
- Submit the score to a leaderboard
- Go back to the main menu

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the events are running for the editor.
eventsFunctions.name: IsInGameEdition
eventsFunctions.sentence: Events are running for the editor

eventsFunctions.description: Return a formated time for a given timestamp
eventsFunctions.name: FormatTime

eventsFunctions.description: Formats a number to a string with the specified number of decimal places.
eventsFunctions.name: ToFixed

eventsBasedObjects.description: Display the score and let players choose what to do next.
eventsBasedObjects.name: LeaderboardDialog

events.comment:
Handle leaderboards.
To create a leaderboard, make sure your game is registered in Home > Profile > Games Dashboard and then, click on "Manage game" > Leaderboards. When a leaderboard is created, it should be available in the actions.

eventsFunctions.description: the best score of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: BestScore

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the restart button of the dialog is clicked.
eventsFunctions.name: IsRestartClicked

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the next button of the dialog is clicked.
eventsFunctions.name: IsNextClicked

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the back button of the dialog is clicked.
eventsFunctions.name: IsBackClicked

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the score has been sucessfully submitted by the dialog.
eventsFunctions.name: IsScoreSubmitted

events.comment: Allow to try and submit again in case of error.

eventsFunctions.description: Fade in the decoration objects of the dialog.
eventsFunctions.name: TweenIn

eventsFunctions.description: Fade out the decoration objects of the dialog.
eventsFunctions.name: TweenOut

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the fade in animation of the decorations is finished.
eventsFunctions.name: HasTweenedIn
eventsFunctions.sentence: Fade in animation of _PARAM0_ is finished

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the fade out animation of the decorations is finished.
eventsFunctions.name: HasTweenedOut
eventsFunctions.sentence: Fade out animation of _PARAM0_ is finished
